title: Ucy
author: Ucy
content: Simply employ the service of someone who controls the Bear, Bull and the Market in general(not a joke) . He was strongly involved in the war that helped keep the price from crashing massively last year ... Things have never remained thesame ever since he stopped fighting from the ending of last year 2021. He could do this for free if people will be willing to listen & obey his good instructions. Seems some do not want to recognize his contributions and are not ready to reciprocate them. They probably prefer to fall into poverty than allow even a cent from their wallet to reach a fellow colleague who controls the price. Remember, the one who controls the price currently controls the economy of every nation... This is only possible because the CREATOR gave him that authority.
